name: WorkflowUIInfoEnt
description: Contains workflow UI-related properties such as grid settings, connection appearance etc.

fields.name: SnapToGrid
fields.description: Whether to snap to the grid.

fields.name: ShowGrid
fields.description: Whether to show the grid lines.

fields.name: ZoomLevel
fields.description: Workflows zoom level, i.e. its magnification.

fields.name: HasCurvedConnection
fields.description: Whether connections are rendered as curves.

fields.name: ConnectionLineWidtdh
fields.description: Width of the line connection two nodes.
